definition[0]: to become bigger by increasing the amount of air inside, or to make something bigger in this way
example[0]: The pastry will puff up while it bakes.
example[1]: Birds puff up their feathers to keep warm.
definition[1]: if a part of your body puffs up, it swells painfully because of injury or infection
example[2]: My eye had puffed up because of a mosquito bite.
